00035   return;

00043 void DispatchHandlerSynchronizer::handle(EventPtr &eventPtr) {
00044   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00045   HT_EXPECT(m_valid == 0x11111111, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00046   m_receive_queue.push(eventPtr);
00047   m_cond.notify_one();    
00048 }

00055 bool DispatchHandlerSynchronizer::wait_for_reply(EventPtr &eventPtr) {
00056   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00057 
00058   while (m_receive_queue.empty())
00059     m_cond.wait(lock);
00060 
00061   eventPtr = m_receive_queue.front();
00062   m_receive_queue.pop();
00063 
00064   if (eventPtr->type == Event::MESSAGE && Protocol::response_code(eventPtr.get()) == Error::OK)
00065     return true;
00066 
00067   return false;
00068 }
